UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Amino acid substitutions in an alpha-helical antimicrobial arachnid peptide affect its chemical properties and biological activity towards pathogenic bacteria but improves its therapeutic index.
Literature.Author: Rodriguez A, Villegas E, Satake H, Possani LD, Corzo G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=300µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=300µM),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=300µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=300µM),Shigella flexneri(MIC=300µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi ATCC 6399(MIC=300µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 7644(MIC=300µM)
